revision.text:
'''Zapparia''' or '''Kar Sipar''', was an ancient city in [[Assyria|Assyrian]] period located in modern [[Zebari Kurds|Zebari]]<ref>Studies on the Civilization and Culture of Nuzi and the Hurrians, General studies and excavations at Nuzi 9/1 By Ernest Ren√© Lacheman, Martha A. Morrison, David I. Owen, 1981, 496 pages, see pages: 6 & 54, {{ISBN|0-931464-08-0}}</ref> region in [[Iraqi Kurdistan]].
